ACCOUNT_NOT_ACTIVATED.title: Reset request denied
ACCOUNT_NOT_ACTIVATED.detail: This accounts password cannot be reset because it is not currently activated

INVALID_EMAIL_FORMAT.title: Reset request denied
INVALID_EMAIL_FORMAT.detail: The provided email is not a valid email address.

UNKNOWN_EMAIL_ADDRESS.title: Reset request denied
UNKNOWN_EMAIL_ADDRESS.detail: The provided email does not match the email for this account.

DB_ERROR_FETCHING_ACCOUNT.title: Reset request denied
DB_ERROR_FETCHING_ACCOUNT.detail: The password reset request did not commplete due to an error looking up the account.

DB_ERROR_SAVING_RESET_TOKEN.title: Reset request denied
DB_ERROR_SAVING_RESET_TOKEN.detail: The password reset request did not commplete due to an while preparing the reset token.
